lead_paragraph: The decision by four top South African and Australian players to opt out of Olympic golf has left lower-ranked men from both countries scrambling to qualify for Rio after having been resigned to missing out.

headline.print_headline: Golf Absences Open Door for South Africans, Australians for Rio Games
headline.main: Golf Absences Open Door for South Africans, Australians for Rio Games

snippet: The decision by four top South African and Australian players to opt out of Olympic golf has left lower-ranked men from both countries scrambling to qualify for Rio after having been resigned to missing out....
